text: Her cyð on þisum gewrite þæt Orcy hæfð gegyfen þæ gegyldhealle & þone stede æt Abbodesbyrig Gode to lofe & Sancte Petre.
& þam gyldscipe to agenne on dæge & æfter dæge him & his gebeddan to langsumum gemynde.
Se ðe þis awendan wyle hæbbe him wið Gode gemæne on þæm micclan dome.
Ðonne syndon ðis þa forword þe Orecy & þa gegyldan æt Abbodesbyrig gecoren habbað Gode to lofe & Sancte Petre to wurðmynte & heora sawlum to þearfe.
Ðæt is ærost, ðrym nihton ær Petres mæssan æt ælcon gegyldan ænne peningc oððe an peningcwurð weaxes, loc hwæðer mare neod sy into þam mynstre.
& on mæsseæfen æt twam gegyldum ænne bradne hlaf well besewen & well gesyfled to urum gemænum ælmyssan.
& fif wucan ær Petres mæssedæge sceote ælc gegylda ænne gyldsester fulne clænes hwætes, & þæt beo gelæst binnan twam dagum.

Be þæs inganges wite, þæt syndon þry sestras hwætes & se wudu beo gelæst binnan ðrym dagum æfter ðam corngesceote, æt ælcon riht gegyldan ane byrðene wudes, & twa æt ðam ungyldan, oððe gylde ænne gyldsester cornes.
And se ðe bryðene underfehð, & þæt gecweme ne deð, beo he his inganges scyldig, & þær ne beo nan gyfu.
& se gylda þe oðerne misgret innan gylde on eornostne hige, gebete he þæt be his ingange wið ealre geferrædene.
& syððan wið þone man þe he mysgrette, swa swa he hit findan mæge, & gif he nele to bote gebugan, þolige he þære geferrædene, & ælcere oðre gyldrædene.
And se ðe ma manna inlæde ðonne he sceole buton ðæs stiwerdes leafe & ðæra feormera gylde his ingang.
And gyf ænigum on urum geferrædene his forðsið getide, sceote ælc gegylda ænne peningc æt þam lice for þære sawle, oððe gylde be þry gegyldum.
& gyf ure ænig geuntrumod sy binnan <syxtigum> <milan> þonne findon we fiftyne men þæt hine gefeccon.
& gyf he forðfaren sy XXX, & þa hine gebringon to þære stowe þe he to gyrnde on his life.
& gyf he on neawyste forðfaren sy, warnige man þone stiwerd to hwylcere stowe þæt lic sceole, & se stiwerd warnige syððan ða gegyldan.
Swa fela swa he mæge mæst to geridan oððe to gesendan, þæt hi þærto cumon, & þæt lic wurðlice bestandan, & to mynstre ferian, & for þære sawle georne gebiddan.
Þæt byð rihtlice gecweden gyldrædene þæt we þus don, & hit geristð þæt well, ægðer ge for Gode ge for worolde.
Forðan ðe we nyton hwylc ure hraðost forðfærð.
Þonne gelyfe we þurh Godes fultume, þæt us fremige eallon þas forword gecweden on ær gif we hit rihtlice healdað.
Uton biddan God ælmihtigne georne mid inwerdre heortan, þæt he us miltsige & eac swa his halgan apostol Sancte Petre, þæt he us geþingige & urne weg geryme to ecere reste.
Forðan ðe we for his lufon þis gegyld gegaderodon.
He hæfð þone anweald on heofenum, þæt he mot lætan into heofenon þone þe he wyle, & forwirnan þam þe he nele.
Swa swa Crist sylf cwæð to him on his godspelle, Petrus ic betæce þe heofenan rices cæge, & swa hwæt swa þu wylt habban gebunden ofer eorðan þæt byð gebunden on heofenum.
& swa hwæt swa ðu wylt habban unbunden ofer eorðan þæt byð unbunden on heofenum.
Uton habban hyht & hopan to him þæt he us bewite a her on worulde.
& æfter forðsiðe ure sawla gehelpe he us gebringe on ecere reste: Amen.
